snippet: American adoptive families are left in legalistic limbo as officials within Russia’s bureaucracy try to figure out what higher-ups at the Kremlin actually want and expect them to do about the ban.
abstract: American families whose adoptions of Russian children were approved before adoption ban took effect on January 1 are left in legalistic limbo as officials within Russia’s bureaucracy puzzle over Kremlin's desires and expectations in matter.
lead_paragraph: American adoptive families are left in legalistic limbo as officials within Russia’s bureaucracy try to figure out what higher-ups at the Kremlin actually want and expect them to do about the ban.

headline.seo: In Russia, Ban on U.S. Adoptions Creates Rancor and Confusion
headline.main: In Russia, Ban on U.S. Adoptions Creates Rancor and Confusion
headline.print_headline: In Russia, Ban on U.S. Adoptions Creates Rancor and Confusion
